content.p: NLog uses Subversion 1.0 (http://subversion.tigris.org) as its version control system. We recommend a very good Win32 Subversion client called TortoiseSVN.
You can grab the latest sources of the library and supporting tools at: http://svn.nlog-project.org/repos/nlog/trunk/NLog. Contact Jarek to get Subversion access.
The source snapshots are automatically generated on each day and are available here.
